00020 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_TIMEBASE_H
00021 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_TIMEBASE_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/queue.h>
00024 
00025 #if defined(__KERNEL__) || defined(__XENO_SIM__)
00026 
00027 struct xntimer;
00028 
00029 typedef struct xntbops {
00030 
00031     int (*start_timer)(struct xntimer *timer,
00032                        xnticks_t value,
00033                        xnticks_t interval,
00034                        int mode);
00035     void (*stop_timer)(struct xntimer *timer);
00036     xnticks_t (*get_timer_date)(struct xntimer *timer);
00037     xnticks_t (*get_timer_timeout)(struct xntimer *timer);
00038     xnticks_t (*get_timer_interval)(struct xntimer *timer);
00039     xnticks_t (*get_timer_raw_expiry)(struct xntimer *timer);
00040     void (*move_timer)(struct xntimer *timer);
00041 
00042 } xntbops_t;
00043 
00044 #define XNTBRUN  0x00000001     /* Time base is running. */
00045 #define XNTBSET  0x00000002     /* Time set in time base. */
00046 #define XNTBLCK  0x00000004     /* Time base is locked. */
00047 
00048 typedef struct xntbase {
00049 
00050         struct xntbops *ops;    
00052         xnticks_t jiffies;      
00054         void (*hook)(void);     
00056         xnticks_t wallclock_offset; 
00058         u_long tickvalue;       
00060         u_long ticks2sec;       
00062         u_long status;          
00064         const char *name;       /* !< Name of time base. */
00065 
00066         xnholder_t link;
00067 
00068 #define link2tbase(ln)  container_of(ln, xntbase_t, link)
00069 
00070 } xntbase_t;
00071 
00072 #define xntbase_timeset_p(base) (!!testbits((base)->status,XNTBSET))
00073 
00074 #ifdef __cplusplus
00075 extern "C" {
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 extern xntbase_t nktbase;
00079 
00080 extern xnqueue_t nktimebaseq;
00081 
00082 static inline u_long xntbase_get_ticks2sec(xntbase_t *base)
00083 {
00084         return base->ticks2sec;
00085 }
00086 
00087 static inline u_long xntbase_get_tickval(xntbase_t *base)
00088 {
00089         /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00090         return base->tickvalue;
00091 }
00092 
00093 static inline void xntbase_set_hook(xntbase_t *base, void (*hook)(void))
00094 {
00095         base->hook = hook;
00096 }
00097 
00098 static inline int xntbase_enabled_p(xntbase_t *base)
00099 {
00100         return !!(base->status & XNTBRUN);
00101 }
00102 
00103 static inline const char *xntbase_name(xntbase_t *base)
00104 {
00105         return base->name;
00106 }
00107 
00108 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00109 
00110 static inline xntime_t xntbase_ticks2ns(xntbase_t *base, xnticks_t ticks)
00111 {
00112         /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00113         return ticks * xntbase_get_tickval(base);
00114 }
00115 
00116 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_ns2ticks(xntbase_t *base, xntime_t t)
00117 {
00118         return xnarch_ulldiv(t, xntbase_get_tickval(base), NULL);
00119 }
00120 
00121 static inline int xntbase_periodic_p(xntbase_t *base)
00122 {
00123         return base->tickvalue != 1;
00124 }
00125 
00126 static inline int xntbase_master_p(xntbase_t *base)
00127 {
00128         return base == &nktbase;
00129 }
00130 
00131 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_get_jiffies(xntbase_t *base)
00132 {
00133         return xntbase_periodic_p(base) ? base->jiffies : xnarch_get_cpu_tsc();
00134 }
00135 
00136 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_get_rawclock(xntbase_t *base)
00137 {
00138         return xntbase_get_jiffies(base);
00139 }
00140 
00141 int xntbase_alloc(const char *name,
00142                   u_long period,
00143                   xntbase_t **basep);
00144 
00145 void xntbase_free(xntbase_t *base);
00146 
00147 int xntbase_update(xntbase_t *base,
00148                    u_long period);
00149 
00150 int xntbase_switch(const char *name,
00151                    u_long period,
00152                    xntbase_t **basep);
00153 
00154 void xntbase_start(xntbase_t *base);
00155 
00156 void xntbase_stop(xntbase_t *base);
00157 
00158 void xntbase_tick(xntbase_t *base);
00159 
00160 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00161 
00162 void xntimer_tick_aperiodic(void);
00163 
00164 static inline xntime_t xntbase_ticks2ns(xntbase_t *base, xnticks_t ticks)
00165 {
00166         return ticks;
00167 }
00168 
00169 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_ns2ticks(xntbase_t *base, xntime_t t)
00170 {
00171         return t;
00172 }
00173 
00174 static inline int xntbase_periodic_p(xntbase_t *base)
00175 {
00176         return 0;
00177 }
00178 
00179 static inline int xntbase_master_p(xntbase_t *base)
00180 {
00181         return 1;
00182 }
00183 
00184 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_get_jiffies(xntbase_t *base)
00185 {
00186         return xnarch_get_cpu_time();
00187 }
00188 
00189 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_get_rawclock(xntbase_t *base)
00190 {
00191         return xnarch_get_cpu_tsc();
00192 }
00193 
00194 static inline int xntbase_alloc(const char *name, u_long period, xntbase_t **basep)
00195 {
00196         *basep = &nktbase;
00197         return 0;
00198 }
00199 
00200 static inline void xntbase_free(xntbase_t *base)
00201 {
00202 }
00203 
00204 static inline int xntbase_update(xntbase_t *base, u_long period)
00205 {
00206         return 0;
00207 }
00208 
00209 static inline int xntbase_switch(const char *name, u_long period, xntbase_t **basep)
00210 {
00211         return period == XN_APERIODIC_TICK ? 0 : -ENODEV;
00212 }
00213 
00214 static inline void xntbase_start(xntbase_t *base)
00215 {
00216 }
00217 
00218 static inline void xntbase_stop(xntbase_t *base)
00219 {
00220 }
00221 
00222 static inline void xntbase_tick(xntbase_t *base)
00223 {
00224         xntimer_tick_aperiodic();
00225 }
00226 
00227 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00228 
00229 #ifdef __cplusplus
00230 }
00231 #endif
00232 
00233 static inline void xntbase_mount(void)
00234 {
00235         inith(&nktbase.link);
00236         appendq(&nktimebaseq, &nktbase.link);
00237 }
00238 
00239 static inline void xntbase_umount(void)
00240 {
00241         removeq(&nktimebaseq, &nktbase.link);
00242 }
00243 
00244 #endif /* __KERNEL__ || __XENO_SIM__ */
